tellolib.control

Interface TelloControlInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    TelloControl

    public interface TelloControlInterface
    Higher level interface to Tello Drone library.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void backward(java.lang.Integer distance)
      Move backward.
      void connect()
      Establishes connection to the Tello Drone.
      void disconnect()
      Disconnecting from the drone.

      Set mission mode state.
      void setSpeed(java.lang.Integer speed)
      Set the drone's speed.
      void startKeepAlive()
      Start keep alive thread that pings the Tello every 10 seconds with a get battery level command to keep the Tello from shutting down automatically if it receives no commands for 15 seconds.
      void startStatusMonitor()
      Start monitoring the status updates sent by the Tello.
      void stop()
      Stop drone motion, goes into hover.

      Stops the keep alive thread.

      Stop monitoring the status updates sent by the Tello.

      Turn off video stream.
      void streamOn()
      Turn on video stream.

      Taking off from the ground.
      void up(java.lang.Integer distance)
      Move up.

    • Method Detail

      • setLogLevel

        void setLogLevel(java.util.logging.Level logLevel)
        set logging level. Defaults to OFF.
        Parameters:
        logLevel - Desired log level.

      • connect

        void connect()
        Establishes connection to the Tello Drone.

      • disconnect

        void disconnect()
        Disconnecting from the drone. If the drone is not landed yet, it will start an automatic landing.

      • enterCommandMode

        void enterCommandMode()
        Enter command mode. You can only execute commands after this call.

      • takeOff

        void takeOff()
        Taking off from the ground.

      • land

        void land()
        Landing on the ground.

      • doFlip

        void doFlip(TelloFlip telloFlip)
        Doing a flip in the chosen direction.
        Parameters:
        telloFlip - Type of the flip.

      • setSpeed

        void setSpeed(java.lang.Integer speed)
        Set the drone's speed.
        Parameters:
        speed - Chosen speed (10-100 cm/s).

      • forward

        void forward(java.lang.Integer distance)
        Move forward.
        Parameters:
        distance - (20-500 cm).

      • backward

        void backward(java.lang.Integer distance)
        Move backward.
        Parameters:
        distance - (20-500 cm).

      • right

        void right(java.lang.Integer distance)
        Move right.
        Parameters:
        distance - (20-500 cm).

      • left

        void left(java.lang.Integer distance)
        Move left.
        Parameters:
        distance - (20-500 cm).

      • up

        void up(java.lang.Integer distance)
        Move up.
        Parameters:
        distance - (20-500 cm).

      • down

        void down(java.lang.Integer distance)
        Move down.
        Parameters:
        distance - (20-500 cm).

      • rotateRight

        void rotateRight(java.lang.Integer angle)
        rotate right.
        Parameters:
        angle - (0-3600 deg).

      • rotateLeft

        void rotateLeft(java.lang.Integer angle)
        rotate left.
        Parameters:
        angle - (0-3600 deg).

      • goTo

        void goTo(java.lang.Integer x,
          java.lang.Integer y,
          java.lang.Integer z,
          java.lang.Integer speed)
        Fly to these offsets from current position.
        Parameters:
        x - X axis offset (20-500 cm).
        y - Y axis offset (20-500 cm).
        z - Z axis offset (20-500 cm).
        speed - Speed of movement (10-100 cm/s).

      • flyRC

        void flyRC(java.lang.Integer lr,
           java.lang.Integer fb,
           java.lang.Integer ud,
           java.lang.Integer yaw)
        Fly by remote control.
        Parameters:
        lr - Left/Right (-100 to 100).
        fb - forward/backward (-100 to 100).
        ud - up/down (-100 to 100).
        yaw - yaw value in degrees.

      • getBattery

        int getBattery()
        Get current battery level.
        Returns:
        Battery level %.

      • getSpeed

        int getSpeed()
        Get current speed setting.
        Returns:
        Speed (1-100 cm/s).

      • getTime

        int getTime()
        Get flight time.
        Returns:
        Flight time in seconds.

      • getHeight

        int getHeight()
        Get drone height.
        Returns:
        Height (0-3000 cm).

      • getTemp

        int getTemp()
        Get drone temperature.
        Returns:
        Temperature in degrees C (0-90).

      • getBarometer

        double getBarometer()
        Get barometric pressure.
        Returns:
        Pressure in millibars.

      • getAttitude

        int[] getAttitude()
        Get IMU attitude data. Only valid when status monitoring enabled.
        Returns:
        Pitch, roll, yaw.

      • getAcceleration

        double[] getAcceleration()
        Get IMU acceleration. Only valid when status monitoring enabled.
        Returns:
        Angular acceleration x, y, z (.001 g).

      • getTof

        double getTof()
        Get distance from TOF.
        Returns:
        Distance (30-1000 cm).

      • getSN

        java.lang.String getSN()
        Get drone serial number. Requires EDU with SDK 1.3 or later.
        Returns:
        Serial Number.

      • getConnection

        TelloConnection getConnection()
        Get drone connection status.
        Returns:
        Connection status.

      • getSDK

        java.lang.String getSDK()
        Get drone sdk version. Requires EDU with SDK 1.3 or later.
        Returns:
        Version.

      • stop

        void stop()
        Stop drone motion, goes into hover.

      • emergency

        void emergency()
        Stop all motors.

      • streamOn

        void streamOn()
        Turn on video stream.

      • streamOff

        void streamOff()
        Turn off video stream.

      • startStatusMonitor

        void startStatusMonitor()
        Start monitoring the status updates sent by the Tello. Requires SDK 1.3 or later.

      • stopStatusMonitor

        void stopStatusMonitor()
        Stop monitoring the status updates sent by the Tello. Requires SDK 1.3 or later. Monitor will be stopped when disconnect() is called.

      • startKeepAlive

        void startKeepAlive()
        Start keep alive thread that pings the Tello every 10 seconds with a get battery level command to keep the Tello from shutting down automatically if it receives no commands for 15 seconds.

      • stopKeepAlive

        void stopKeepAlive()
        Stops the keep alive thread. Thread will be stopped when disconnect() is called.

      • setMissionMode

        void setMissionMode(boolean enabled,
                    MissionDetectionCamera camera)
        Set mission mode state. In mission mode, status monitoring will record information about any mission pad detected by the selected camera(s).
        Parameters:
        enabled - True to enable, false to disable.
        camera - Select which camera(s) used for detection when enabled.
